sourcesContent: import{useCallback as e,useRef as t}from"react";import c from"../useEventListener/index.js";function r(r){var a=r.ref,n=r.callback,o=e((function(e){a&&a.current&&!a.current.contains(e.target)&&n(e)}),[a,n]),u=t(document.body);c({eventName:"click",ref:u,callback:o,capture:!0}),c({eventName:"touchend",ref:u,callback:o,capture:!0})}export{r as default};
